author: PostmodernJukebox
description:
“Grandma Got Run Over By A Reindeer” by Elmo & Patsy cover by Postmodern Jukebox ft. Sunny Holiday.
Get The Song: http://pmjlive.com/grandma | Subscribe: http://bit.ly/subPMJ
World Tour Tix: http://pmjtour.com | PMJ on Spotify: http://pmjlive.com/pmjspotify 

In this year's PMJ Christmas video, we are covering a true classic - in every sense of the word. Here's the 1979 Elmo & Patsy novelty Christmas song, "Grandma Got Run Over By A Reindeer," as sung by PMJ visual director & "Old Soul" chanteuse, Sunny Holiday - with help from our "Reinderettes," Tatum Langley & Demi Remick. Merry Christmas from all of us at PMJ!

Follow Sunny Holiday: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/misssunnyholiday/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/misssunnyholiday/

See Postmodern Jukebox LIVE! Tickets On Sale NOW for the US/Canada, UK, Europe, Australia/NZ, Asia — find over 100 dates on sale here: http://smarturl.it/tourpmjyt 

Follow Postmodern Jukebox:
Mailing List: http://smarturl.it/pmjsignup

title: Grandma Got Run Over By A Reindeer - Postmodern Jukebox ft. Sunny Holiday
